definition: United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: This is smaller than the share of the UK in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 這比起在全球經濟中英聯邦所佔的份額來還要少一些。
英聯邦運動會就是主要的例子。

sentences.english: The Commonwealth agreed to make a compact with this country.
sentences.chinese: 英聯邦同意和這個國家訂約。

sentences.english: Cyprus had received its independence from the UK in 1960.
sentences.chinese: 塞浦路斯在1960年從英聯邦獲得獨立。

sentences.english: “The Commonwealth Games village is seriously compromised, ” Michael Fennell, president of the Commonwealth Games Federation, said yesterday in a statement.
sentences.chinese: “英聯邦運動會的運動員村受到嚴重破壞”。

sentences.english: I have worked closely with my own women's mentoring group at The Commonwealth Institute.
sentences.chinese: 我曾與我們女性指導團隊在英聯邦研究所密切合作過。

sentences.english: 1961 - South Africa withdraws from the Commonwealth of Nations.
Dominion is a part of the British Commonwealth.
sentences.chinese: 自治領是英聯邦的一個組成部分。

sentences.english: Peltate is a seventy cents of one symbol British Commonwealth of Nations country star superjacent.
sentences.chinese: 盾形上方爲一枚象徵英聯邦國家的七角星。

sentences.english: The Commonwealth has admitted Rwanda as its 54th member.
sentences.chinese: 英聯邦同意盧旺達作爲第54個成員國的加入。

sentences.english: I thought Indian people were proud of being part of the commonwealth contries, aka Great Britain colonies.
sentences.chinese: 我想印度人對於成爲英聯邦的一部分感到很驕傲。

sentences.english: An energy-efficient house system in the U.K. can detect if the occupant has fallen ill.
sentences.chinese: 在英聯邦一所節能房屋能探測居住者是否生病。

sentences.english: The centenary of Federation is also the centenary of the White Australia policy.
sentences.chinese: 英聯邦的時代也就是白澳政策盛行的時代。

sentences.english: Johnson set up a new Commonwealth Games in the 10000 meters.
sentences.chinese: 約翰遜創英聯邦運動會萬米賽跑新紀錄。

sentences.english: Shield shape whether one symbolize the British Commonwealth seven star of country.
sentences.chinese: 盾形上方爲一枚象徵英聯邦國家的七角星。
